meaningMnemonic: The <kanji>guest</kanji>s who are <kanji>view</kanji>ing are the <vocabulary>audience</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>spectators</vocabulary>. That's all that viewers who are guests at a location do, right? Makes total sense.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
